name: Wesley Hinkle
summary_of_qualifications: \textbf{Software Developer} with many years of experience specializing in the development of web and mobile applications for workers' unions, delivering solutions that handle complex operations such as dues collection, employer fringes and reciprocity, benefits tracking, and pension estimations, impacting thousands of union employees across the U.S.

\textbf{Backend Developer} with extensive experience in data integration and transformation, skilled at modeling domains and designing relational schema, capable of mapping disparate legacy data into cohesive, modern solutions, and adept at overcoming challenges like inconsistent data and varying system requirements

\textbf{Software Engineer} who applies a principled and pragmatic bottom-up approach, emphasizing strong software architecture, while working with teams to implement structured, scalable solutions that prioritize maintainability and code quality

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Cognitive Science (Credit Hours Completed)
education.program: Interdisciplinary program combining Computer Science, Linguistics, Philosophy of Mind, Cognitive Psychology, and Neuroscience
